spawn_caps.fleet_enemies: Use Normal enemy spawn cap (count toward the 120 normal enemy limit)

spawn_behavior.normal_enemies: spawn based on percentage chances that add up to 100% per wave
spawn_behavior.elite_enemies: have special spawn rules with limits of 1-2 per wave depending on wave progression
spawn_behavior.boss_enemies: only spawn on boss waves (every 10 waves, unless modified by battle conditions)
spawn_behavior.fleet_enemies: spawn on specific wave intervals starting from Tier 14

protector.spawn_limit: Only 1 Protector can spawn per wave
protector.cooldown: There is a cooldown between Protector spawn chances
protector.max_active: Maximum of 8 Protectors can be active at once

elite.spawn_limit: Limited to 1 spawn per wave initially, up to 2 at higher waves
elite.spawn_distribution: Elite enemies share spawn percentages between the 3 types (Vampire, Ray, Scatter)
elite.max_active: Maximum of 8 of each elite type on screen at once (Scatter children don't count toward this limit)

fleet.guaranteed_spawn: Fleet enemies will always spawn when they should
fleet.wave_skip_behavior: Wave skipping a wave where a Fleet Enemy would spawn will still spawn the fleet enemy
fleet.spawn_group_size: Fleet enemies spawn with a group of 10-14 related enemies
fleet.spawn_priority: If enemy spawn count is capped, a related enemy will despawn to allow the fleet to spawn
